name: Ludam Dare 40: Ocean Explorer
description:
You are the worlds best diver and when a city of lost artefacts are found it is your job to go after them. Unfortunately you have only a limited air supply and an ocean guarded by hungry sharks so you have to use your only tool, a state of the arts Grappling Hook . Use your tool to collect treasures and fight off sharks in this exciting new adventure, Ocean Explorer!

This game was made for the LUDAM DARE 40, it was a challenging 3 days but we think the result turned out well. This was my second LUDAM DARE and first working with a partner which this was his first LUDAM DARE.

You can check it our here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/ocean-explorer

Controls:

WASD - To move around

Right Click - To shoot grappling hook

Tools Used:

Unity 5.6 (game engine)

Piskel (Graphics)

Bosca Ceoil (Music)

Credits:

- Hyperwolf : Programmer

- prof_crabpot : Graphics
